headline.main: STYLE SHOW FEATURES LOW-COST WARDROBE; Pershing Sq. Center Display Stresses Material Saving

lead_paragraph: To help women conserve materials without sacrificing any of the morale building quality which good clothes provide, a style show demonstrating how as little as $20 can buy a complete season's wardrobe was held last night at the Civilian Defense Information Center at Pershing Square.
abstract: Home Econ Women in Business Com sponsors low cost wardrobe style show, NYC
